body:
you can't share links with users, you can share directly with users.

in the admin settings, is 'allow users to share with anyone' selected or 'allow users to only share with users in their groups.' those should be obvious what they do, i'm not sure if ldap does anything with groups however.

i tried both settings, none does what i expect. there is a configuration field base group tree in the advanced tab. it this field only used for authentication to check if a user is inside a specific group? i expected that all users inside of this group are loaded into ownclouds usermanagement, so other users of this group can share content with each other.
sharing content by link works great, but it would be nice if sharing content to other users when they are authenticated through ldap would work, too.

i'm having the same problem, the option to share with any user is active, only sharing with ldap groups works. 
ps i am using ldap anonymous bind. could it be related?

edit: my problem was for the share and the users not listed in user administration page that i didn't filled in ldap configuration my user filter. so all ldap connection was ok. maybe we should consider to have a warning message or make this field mandatory ?


original message :
same problem here.
i'm running oc 5.0.5 and on file and gallery application if i try to share a file or directory 
the autocompletion only show internal database users and not users from ldap.
sharing with internal database users is working fine.

as described by @fr00d, i don't see neither my ldap users in /settings/users administration page (only internal users).

in share settings i activated sharing api, links, re-sharing and i allow users to share with everyone.

i’m closing this issue because it has been inactive for a few months. this probably means that the issue is not reproducible or it has been fixed in a newer version.

please reopen if you still encounter this issue with the [latest stable version](http://owncloud.org/install/) (currently owncloud 5.0.9) and then please use the [issue template](https://raw.github.com/owncloud/core/master/issue_template.md). you an also contribute directly by providing a patch – see the [developer manual](http://doc.owncloud.org/server/5.0/developer_manual/). :)

thank you!

still the same in owncloud 5.0.9.

when _user list filter_ is empty, sharing will not work. as mentioned above _user list filter_ should be either marked as mandatory or the current behaviour should be fixed.
@blizzz and @mtgap any update or resolution to this?
user list filter is mandatory. i mean, without specifying who is enlisted there you cannot expect users to show up.
